评论详情: The collar is not the comfiest but it’s not the most uncomfortable either. It’s very nice looking and it holds up very well it’s good for my smaller neck size and fits larger necks too. The spikes and screws are very sturdy and look great as well and haven’t scratched up even months later of heavy use. I love it and the green is very nice and matches similar products of green I have bought on Amazon.

I was very surprised at the quality of the product given it’s affordable price. The leather material isn’t too thin but also not so thick that it irritates your skin. Definitely for looks and not for play, which works just fine for me. There was also no smell which is very common with items such as these. Don’t be discouraged if yours has a few creases in it from being in the box, the creases have basically all gone now that I’ve worn it once or twice. If you’re thinking of purchasing I’d say go for it!
It has many neck sizes to choose from, just like a belt around your waist. It has my neck size as a hole, which is great!

评论概述: Perfect for a complete goth loook
评论详情: The good: This is a great spiked necklace with slightly longer spikes than your typical little baby spikes. I like that it came in all black on the basic pleather.  The bad: My neck is 16.25 in wide and I added an extra two holes to accommodate it. So if you have a larger neck it might not fit you. Conclusion: For me it was absolutely worth it. Given that you have a neck to mention that will fit this, I will definitely buy it.  If you liked my review, please consider giving me a thumbs up. It helps me out in the long run.

评论概述: Perfect. Just heckin buy it seriously
评论详情: For the price point, the quality is surprisingly very good. I would have expected a much more expensive choker to be this comfortable, sturdy, and fashionable. I am an extremely small person and this fit my neck, though there was quite a bit of extra material in the back. The spikes are sturdy. Whatever it's made of is extremely soft, almost velvety. I don't think this would be good to wear if you live where the summers are hot and humid like the SE United States as it is thick. This is a freat product. I hesitated because "you get what you pay for" but in this case you're getting way more than what you pay for.

评论详情: I like the collar, it's very cute. Usually things are too large for me cause i have a very small neck but this has plenty of holes for size options. I will have to trim off the strap extra so it's not flopping around behind my neck but that's minor. My biggest beef with this is it literally came all haphazardly rolled up in a ball in a tiny little box and because of that you can see the creases and bend in the faux leather where they bent it to cram it in there in my third photo. If they would've just used a bit larger packaging and it came in better condition i would've given it a 5 star, but i'm still relatively content.
